title: Democrats respond to Trump's Congressional address
shortDescription: Sen. Elissa Slotkin delivered the Democratic response to President Donald Trump's speech to a joint session of Congress.

title: Democrats target Elon Musk, Trump's 'reckless way' in rebuttal
shortDescription: The Democratic rebuttal to President Trump’s joint address to Congress Tuesday focused on kitchen-table issues while taking aim at Elon Musk.

title: 'America is back': 5 takeaways on Trump's address to divided nation
shortDescription: President Trump mocked foes and defended his 'America First' direction for the country amid rising anxiety about the economy, nation's direction

title: After laying off thousands, Trump barely mentions federal workers
shortDescription: Firing federal employees has been a key to Trump's first month in office, but they barely came up in his speech to Congress.

title: Trump says Ukraine ready for peace deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says he is ready to sign a peace deal in a letter he sent to Trump.

title: 'One way or the other': Trump tells Congress he'll acquire Greenland
shortDescription: The president's designs on Greenland, the Panama Canal and Canada have been an early theme of his presidency.

title: Who is Jocelyn Nungaray? Trump renames sanctuary after murdered child
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held an executive order renaming a wildlife sanctuary to honor the late Jocelyn Nungaray.

title: Democrats chant 'January 6' at Trump during Congressional speech
shortDescription: Congressional Democrats invoked the memory of the January 6 attack on the Capitol during Trump's address on Tuesday night.

title: Trump to Congress: Would you like some shock with that awe?
shortDescription: In a speech to a Joint Session of Congress, President Trump brags about disruption and promises more. Oh, and have you met Elon Musk?

title: Elon Musk praised effusively by President Trump in joint address
shortDescription: Elon Musk had a prominent seat at President Trump's joint address ‒ and was praised effusively ‒ as the president defended DOGE.

title: Democrats protest during Trump's address
shortDescription: Democrats wore pink, displayed signs and even interrupted to show their displeasure with President Trump's policies during his address to Congress.

title: Trump tells Congress Zelenskyy sent him a letter expressing gratitude
shortDescription: President Donald Trump Tuesday argued that his combative approach to foreign policy during his second term so far has advanced American interests.

title: Which members of Trump's family showed up for his speech to Congress?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s family showed up in full force for his address before a joint session of Congress. Who was there?

title: Musk, DOGE cheered by Congressional Republicans for budget cuts
shortDescription: Republicans cheered the drastic cost-cutting actions of billionaire and Trump ally Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency.

title: Democrats protest Trump's address with signs: 'This is not normal'
shortDescription: Congressional Democrats protested Donald Trump's speech to Congress with signs reading: "This is not normal" and "Musk steals." Some walked out in the middle of the speech.

title: Al Green, other Democrats protest during Trump's speech to Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green of Texas was escorted out of President Donald Trump's address to Congress as others held signs that said, "This is not normal."

title: Trump family members at address to Congress
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump and other Trump family members attend President Donald Trump's first address to Congress of his second term.

title: Democratic congressman removed from chamber after shouting at Trump
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green was escorted out of the U.S. Capitol chamber Tuesday night after interrupting President Donald Trump's joint congressional address.

title: President Trump begins speech to Joint Session
shortDescription: "We are just getting started." President Donald Trump begins his address to a Joint Session of Congress.

title: Which Supreme Court justices attended Trump's address to Congress?
shortDescription: At least four Supreme Court justices attended President Donald Trump's first joint Congressional address Tuesday of his second term as president.

title: Democratic women wear pink to protest Trump at Congressional address
shortDescription: Democratic women protested Donald Trump at his address to a joint session of Congress by wearing pink.

title: President Trump addresses a divided Congress
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed a joint session of Congress for the first time in his second term as President on Tuesday, March 4, 2025.

title: President Trump's speech to Congress: Is it the State of the Union?
shortDescription: Six weeks after taking office, Trump will address Congress about his "renewal of the American dream."

title: Who is sitting with Melania Trump at president's address to Congress?
shortDescription: Two young women who exemplify causes championed by Melania Trump will be the first lady's guests at Donald Trump's address to Congress.

title: Who are the 'everyday Americans' in the crowd for Trump's address?
shortDescription: The first family announced their guest list shortly before Trump is set to appear on Capitol Hill and address the nation.

title: Trump aims to sell 443 federal buildings, headquarters nationwide
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to sell hundreds of federal buildings, including the FBI's J. Edgar Hoover Building headquarters.

title: House Republicans advised to stop holding in-person town halls
shortDescription: Lawmakers' in-person listening sessions have been overrun with complaints about federal DOGE cuts.

title: Trump administration tells agencies mass firings must come from them
shortDescription: The Trump administration told federal agencies that firings of probationary workers are up to the agencies ‒ not the Office of Personnel Management.

title: AOC tells followers she will not attend Trump's address to Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio Cortez, D-New York, said on Tuesday she would be sitting out President Donald Trump’s address before a joint session of Congress.

title: AG Pam Bondi vows to purge DOJ of Trump critics
shortDescription: Bondi, in an extensive Fox News interview, provided details of the ongoing and apparently widening political purge of the Justice Department and FBI.

title: Weapons shipments to Ukraine stopped after Trump order, Pentagon says
shortDescription: All shipments of U.S. weapons to Ukraine stopped in their tracks after President Donald Trump ordered the pause on aid on Monday.
